solution_line_template: The boys brought a total of {num_boys} x {sticks_per_boy} = <<{num_boys}*{sticks_per_boy}={boys_total}>>{boys_total} popsicle sticks.
The girls brought a total of {num_girls} x {sticks_per_girl} = <<{num_girls}*{sticks_per_girl}={girls_total}>>{girls_total} popsicle sticks.
Therefore, the girls brought {boys_total} - {girls_total} = <<{boys_total}-{girls_total}={fewer_sticks}>>{fewer_sticks} fewer popsicle sticks than the boys.
